message: Paula, it was in reaction to the first comments on the feed. I call it as I see it. It only should offend the culprits doing it. People were complaining and blaming the government rather than doing something about it. The town has many elected officials, which means they can be replaced. (And btw, somebody may have felt proud of that lunch you called """"slop."""" I'm sorry kale doesn't taste as good as bacon.)

And the beat goes on. How about if we all call gun control """"gun safety"""". Pretending like the government is going to take away everyone's guns keeps people from using common sense. Most Americans favor gun safety--people should be made aware of how many are killed very week due to carelessness.

Sony is saying that technology progresses. Is there somehow who actually disagrees with that? Everyone crying tears into a pillow that their PS4v1 might no longer be the top dog of consoles should get a grip. Technology is obsolete before it even hits retailers. How do these sorts of stories yield so many nonsensical replies? The heat comments are garbage, betraying a fundamental misunderstanding of the entire field. GPUs get better. Indeed, one of the biggest improvements lately has been *huge* reductions in the power consumption, and thus heat, of GPUs.
